instruction: Generate a 5-star review of this product.
output: I've had my iPhone 12 for a few months now and I absolutely love it! The sleek design, crisp display, powerful hardware and amazing cameras make it an absolute dream to use. Not only does this phone look and perform great, but the battery life is amazing. I'm usually able to go for a full day without needing to charge it. Highly recommend this phone. It's a real keeper!
